location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to the Government at Bombay, to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a circular from W Gardiner, Secretary to Government at Fort William [Calcutta], dated 6 September 1816, discussing the supply of sulphur, and confirming that further supplies of sulphur from Bushire are not required.
